thread.title: Kristen Stewart to Host 'SNL' with Musical Guest Alessia Cara!
thread.title_full: Kristen Stewart to Host 'SNL' with Musical Guest Alessia Cara!

author: Just Jared
title: Kristen Stewart to Host 'SNL' with Musical Guest Alessia Cara!
text:
Kristen Stewart was just announced as the next host of Saturday Night Live !
The 26-year-old actress will be featured on the sketch comedy series’ upcoming pre-Super Bowl episode on February 4. The musical guest is set to be Alessia Cara .
This is the first time that Kristen is hosting the show, but it’s not the first time it’s come up as a possibility. She previously opened up about doing the show back in 2010.
Click inside to read what Kristen Stewart said years ago… 
“I would love to say yes for sure, but that is really, really scary,” Kristen previously told E! News almost seven years ago. “I am so critical of myself and then also of people who are on the show. It’s like, ‘Nope, you’re not funny—next!’ “
